<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Reaching](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2287)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, slender wand is constructed of silver, polished to a mirror shine.

<document level="2" id="action-1835" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate level. The spell must have a casting time of <actions string="Single Action" /> or <actions string="Two Actions" />, and must have a range.
